author: sky.cactus
content: Currently, the site is configured such that the same person cannot post more than 3 comments in a row.  This is particularly problematic when you setup a discussions-to for an EIP and you post regular updates to that thread as you iterate on the EIP.

author: sky.cactus
content: It means that after the first 3 updates, you cannot post any more until someone else comments, which means that anyone who subscribed to the thread to "follow discussion/progress" won't actually see that discussion/progress.

author: sky.cactus
content: This is doubly problematic when you have discussions on Twitter, Reddit, Discord, GitHub, video chat, audio chat, live chat, etc. and you want to post discussion updates to the discussions-to thread to keep the discussion centered there.

author: sky.cactus
content: I am in this exact situation right now and it is very frustrating.

author: sky.cactus
content: So... can we please remove that limit?
